mapper.update: update car set route_id = #{routeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_type = #{carType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_orgin = #{carOrgin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_prodate = #{carProdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, car_buydate = #{carBuydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, car_capacity = #{carCapacity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, car_state = #{carState,jdbcType=BIT}, Comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select car_id, route_id, car_type, car_orgin, car_prodate, car_buydate, car_capacity, car_state, Comment from car where car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select car_id, route_id, car_type, car_orgin, car_prodate, car_buydate, car_capacity, car_state, Comment from car
